issue.title: [Archery] C++ linting with --clang-format  or archery lint --clang-tidy fails on M1
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17874](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17874). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It seems there is some cmake target issue for `clang-format`  and `clang-tidy` options when running `archery lint` on M1:

```java

...
-- Build files have been written to: /private/var/folders/gw/q7wqd4tx18n_9t4kbkd0bj1m0000gn/T/arrow-lint-g7drna9_/cpp-buildninja: error: unknown target 'check-format' 
```

<https://gist.github.com/AlenkaF/f60e24549529cd096bc9c975bcb71179>
